release.title: Barnett Newman
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Barnett Newman{~/i~} is the final entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/barnett-newman"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Philip Guston
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Philip Guston{~/i~} is the second entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/philip-guston"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Piet Mondrian
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Piet Mondrian{~/i~} is the first entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/piet-mondrian"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Iodine
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Iodine{~/i~} is a series of 100 short, sequentiel pieces which flow between various styles of experimental electronic music.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/iodine"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Frozen Tower of Sound
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Frozen Tower of Sound{~/i~} is a 60-minute electronic composition constructed of several layered digital textures to create the sensation of a fictional, electronic landscape.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/frozen-tower-of-sound"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Nine Feedbacks
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Nine Feedbacks{~/i~} is a 190-minute drone composition which flows through nine recordings of untouched electronic feedback in a randomized order. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/nine-feedbacks"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Organ Memories
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Organ Memories{~/i~} started as a series of turntable improvisations using a box of organ records. Those improvisations were then used as sound material for four 15-minute electroacoustic compositions, which can be heard here. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/organ-memories"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: You Had Better Come on Home
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}You Had Better Come on Home{~/i~} is a single hour-long piece comprised of processed field recordings, sine tones and white noise. It develops an electronic drone and invites it to act as an electronic guide on a journey to, from or through one's home (be that a place, state of mind or something else). {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://rateyourmusic.com/release/album/important-hair/you-had-better-come-on-home/"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: G. GOULD
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}G. GOULD{~/i~} is a 45-minute composition based on a single field recording with sparse manipulations and collaging. It is a reaction to and partial recreation of James Benning's recent film {~i~}L. COHEN{~/i~}, as well as a reaction to the impact that artists like Leonard Cohen and Glenn Gould have had on Canadian culture. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/g-gould"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}180510.180528.180602.{~/i~} is a 60-minute reductionist electronic composition which focuses on the mutation of filtered textures over time.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/180510180528180602"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Plein Soleil
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Plein Soleil{~/i~} is a 69-minute electronic composition, constructed exclusively from sounds extracted from the song of the same name by world's end girlfriend.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/plein-soleil"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Musik kann marschieren
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Musik kann marschieren{~/i~} is the debut release by Good Old Neon, the collaborative project by brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. It is a single 56-minute electronic improvisation combined with a field recording collage created by each member.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2"~}Wisteria Records bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Lines 1 & 2
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Lines 1 & 2{~/i~} includes the first two realizations of Lines, a randomized situation for sound collage, each taking its own disc. The {~i~}Lines{~/i~} system ensures a constant shift of sonic density in the realization, as well as making it so the realization is completely circular, having no beginning or ending. The first realization uses electronic noise and the second uses everyday recordings.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/lines-1-2"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: First Snow
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}First Snow{~/i~} is the first double album by Important Hair and the debut release of compositions by Connor Kurtz. It includes {~i~}First Snow{~/i~}, an analogue synthesizer piece which is realized in an hour-long solo edit and a 20-minute trio edit, {~i~}9 Movements{~/i~}, a minimalist work for electronic keyboard, {~i~}For On Kawara{~/i~}, a tribute to the conceptual minimalist performed on three live sources of static, and {~i~}The Death of John Cage{~/i~}, an original poem which becomes the basis of a sound collage.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/first-snow"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: You Are Crying, My Child
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}You Are Crying, My Child{~/i~} is the debut release of Connor Kurtz's Important Hair project. It is a venture into the more experimental side of analog electronic noise. The album is partially written, partially improvised and partially collaged, using lyrics extracted from Samuel Beckett's 1938 novel {~i~}Murphy{~/i~}{~br /~}{~br /~} The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/you-are-crying-my-child"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Losers
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Losers{~/i~} is a series of noise pieces inspired by Thomas Bernhard's novel {~i~}The Loser{~/i~} made over four years.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/losers"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2019
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2019{~/i~} collects several electronic compositions made throughout the year of 2019.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2019"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2018
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2018{~/i~} collects several electronic compositions made throughout the year of 2018.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2018"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2017
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2017{~/i~} collects several compositions, collages, experiments and electronic improvisations made throughout the year of 2017.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2017"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: Miscellaneous Works, 2016
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2016{~/i~} is the first installment in Important Hair's annual {~i~}Miscellaneous Works{~/i~} series. It includes 8 tracks, including colleges, improvisations and a composition for acoustic guitars.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2016"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

release.title: the fencepost reclamation project volume 6
release.description: {~i~}the fencepost reclamation project volume 6{~/i~} is the sixth volume of a remix compilation by the British {~1 label. It contains a noise piece titled {~i~}creak17 v2{~/i~} by Important Hair.{~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://lessthanone.bandcamp.com/album/the-fencepost-reclamation-project-volume-6-2"~}https://lessthanone.bandcamp.com/album/the-fencepost-reclamation-project-volume-6-2{~/a~}

release.title: War Is Peace, Freedom Is Slavery, Ignorance Is Strength
release.label: Self-Released
release.description: {~i~}War Is Peace, Freedom Is Slavery, Ignorance Is Strength{~/i~} is an album by Texas-based electronic musician Acialist. It contains four short interlude tracks which were created by Important Hair.{~br /~}{~br /~}It is no longer available for download.

release.title: Free Improvisation February: Vol. 1
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Free Improvisation February: Vol. 1{~/i~} is a 19 track compilation, which includes various styles of improvised music. It includes a 29 minute track by Important Hair, titled {~i~}Three Electronic Improvisations (Version Two){~/i~}.{~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/free-improvisation-february-vol-1"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/free-improvisation-february-vol-1{~/a~}

release.title: Noisevember: Vol. 1
release.label: Wisteria Records
release.description: {~i~}Noisevember: Vol. 1{~/i~} is a compilation which explores several different styles of noise music. It includes a 16 minute track by Important Hair, titled {~i~}First Loser{~/i~}. {~br /~}{~br /~}It is available for free download here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/noisevember-vol-1"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/noisevember-vol-1{~/a~}
